anya-e0807n0:10_0: Yā satti pāṇine yā ca, candra+kātyāyanādisu;
anya-e0807n0:12_0: Suttaṁ vutti ca teneva, katā ekena pañcikā;
anya-e0807n0:14_0: Tamhi ca dubbidhaṁ ñeyyaṁ, suttaṁ kammatthabhedato;
anya-e0807n0:19_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:19_1: Taṁ yathā a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, e, ऐ, o, औ,
anya-e0807n0:19_7: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ.
anya-e0807n0:20_0: Akāro ādi mariyādabhūto yesaṁ te aādayo.
anya-e0807n0:21_1: ‘‘kasmā ācariyakaccāyanādīhi viya ekacattālīsakkharāna+makkharasañña+makatvā titālīsakkharānaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katā’’ti. Vuccate –
anya-e0807n0:24_2: neva pana ‘rukkhā vanaṁ’tyādo viya avayave samudāyavohāro,
anya-e0807n0:24_3: ‘samuddo mayā diṭṭho’tyādo viya ca samudāye avayavavohāroti dassetuṁ paccekaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katāti.
anya-e0807n0:25_0: ‘‘Sakkaccasavanaṁ buddhasāsanasampattī’’ti ‘‘sithiladhanitādi akkharavipattiyañhi atthassa dunnayatā hotī’’ti ca yasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:29_8: niggahītassa nāsikā, ṅa, ñña, ṇa, na,
anya-e0807n0:32_0: Yathā avaṅhoti (avaṅa hoti., tañhi, taṇhā, pubbanho, amhe, guyhaṁ, gārayhā, ārulho, bahvakkharanti.
anya-e0807n0:39_0: Evaṁ ṭhāna+karaṇa+payatana+suti kālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0807n0:40_0: Nissayā+do sarā vuttā, nissitā byañjanā tato;
anya-e0807n0:44_0: Aādīsvā+dimhi niddiṭṭhā odantā dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:44_1: Yathā a ā, i ī, u ū, e ऐ, o औ.
anya-e0807n0:47_0: Aādīsvā+dimesu dasasu dve dve savaṇṇā nāma honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:47_1: Yathā a āiti, i īiti, u ū iti, e eiti, o, oiti.
anya-e0807n0:49_0: Tesveva dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n0:49_3: Yathā a i u e o.
anya-e0807n0:49_4: Tesu ‘saṁyogato pubbāva dissanti dve panantimā’ta dassetuṁ tattha sādhuttā tesampi idha saṅgaho,
anya-e0807n0:49_7: Rassakālo nāma accharāsaṅghāto akkhinimmilanasaṅkhāto vā kālo,
anya-e0807n0:51_0: Aādīsvā+dibhūtesu dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n0:51_3: Taṁ yathā ā ī ū e o.
anya-e0807n0:53_0: Aādīsu kādayo niggahītapariyantā tettiṁsa byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:53_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa,
anya-e0807n0:53_6: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ iti.
anya-e0807n0:56_0: Aādīsu kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcakā vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n0:56_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa,
anya-e0807n0:56_5: pa pha ba bha ma iti.
anya-e0807n0:56_8: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavagga+cavaggādivohāraṁ gatā kusalattikādayo viya.
anya-e0807n0:62_0: Vaṇṇā sarā savaṇṇā ca, rassā dīghā ca byañjanā;
anya-e0807n0:66_11: asanto ettha na dissanti itī+dha sarasaññāyaṁ –
anya-e0807n0:68_6: tato vaṇṇa kāla byavadhāne kāriyaṁ na hoti, tva+masi,
anya-e0807n0:71_11: Pubbassa kāriyavidhānā sattamīniddiṭṭhassa paratā+va gamyateti pareti paravacanampi ghaṭate.
anya-e0807n0:72_12: pāto evātī+dha pubbassaralope sampatte ‘‘saro lopo sare’’ tveva.
anya-e0807n0:74_0: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti.
anya-e0807n0:74_19: ‘‘Vivakkhāto sandhayo bhavantī’’ti ñāyā vatticchāpi idha sijjhati.
anya-e0807n0:76_0: Tassa idaṁ, vāta īritaṁ, na upeti, vāma ūru, ati iva aññehi, vi udakaṁ itīdha pubbassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:78_0: Luttā sarā paresaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ e+o honti vā yathākkamaṁ. Yathāsaṁkhyānuddeso samānānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_1: tena savaṇṇopi gayhati sayañca rūpaṁti īūnampi e+o.
anya-e0807n0:80_2: Sabbattha rassassa jātiniddese dīghassāpi gahaṇatthaṁ ida+māraddhaṁ. Tassedaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:80_5: Idañca pacchimodāharaṇadvayaṁ ‘‘avaṇṇe lutte eva e+o hontī’’ti gāhassa nisedhanatthaṁ. Vātveva, tassidaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_8: Pati urasminti vibhajja ‘‘yavā sare’’ti yakāre ‘‘tavaggavaraṇā’’dinā co,
anya-e0807n0:81_6: su āgataṁ, su ākāro, du ākāro,
anya-e0807n0:83_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:84_2: te assa pahīnā pañca, te ahaṁ, ye assa, te ajja,
anya-e0807n0:84_6: ahaṁ kho ajja, so ahaṁ, so ajja, so eva,
anya-e0807n0:84_8: so ahaṁ itī+dha ‘‘yavā sare’’ ‘‘ve’’ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n0:86_0: Eonaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā sare pare yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:86_1: ‘‘Byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīghe adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo,
anya-e0807n0:86_3: tyāssa pahīnā pañca, tyāhaṁ, yyassa, tyajja,
anya-e0807n0:87_0: Go eḷakaṁ, go assaṁ, go ajinaṁ itī+dha ‘‘sare’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:89_1: Sa ca ‘‘ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassā’’ti sabbassa pasaṅge ‘antassā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:91_1: so anekavaṇṇopi antassa hotīti okārasseva hoti.
anya-e0807n0:94_0: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Sa ca –
anya-e0807n0:99_0: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti vā sare kvaci. Āgamino aniyamepi –
anya-e0807n0:102_1: yakārāgameneva ‘‘nipajja’’nti siddhe ‘‘padādīnaṁ kvacī’’ti byañjanassa yukā+gamo niratthakoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n0:102_57: pariyosānaṁ, niyāyogo. Udaggo, udayo, udāhaṭaṁ, udito, udīritaṁ, udeti, sakideva,
anya-e0807n0:103_3: cha āyatanaṁ itī+dha ‘‘vā sare’’ ‘‘āgamo’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0807n0:105_0: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0807n0:107_0: Ādeso nāma so yā tu, asantuppatti āgamo.
anya-e0807n0:111_0: Pubbaparassarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante. Kaññā iva, kaññeva, kaññāva.
anya-e0807n0:112_36: tato ā- mantayi satthāti evamādayo idha kālabyavadhāneneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0807n0:113_7: gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva,
anya-e0807n0:113_34: su akkhāto, yo ahaṁ, so ahaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:118_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0807n0:118_1: Ettha ca āvuttidvivacanaṁ ṭhānedvivacananti dvīsu ṭhānedvivacanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_21: Dhanakkīto, vikkayo, anukkayo. Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho,
anya-e0807n0:119_23: diṭṭhiggāho. Pajjoto, vijjoto, ujjoto. Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:121_0: Vatu+vaṭa+disāna+mante, yathā vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṁ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0807n0:122_4: duccaritaṁ, nijjaṭaṁ, ujjahaṁ, uccaṅgaṁ, unnamati, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, nissāro. Takkaro, tajjo, tanninno,
anya-e0807n0:123_1: abhibhuyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṁ, neyyaṁ, seyyo, jeyyo,
anya-e0807n0:126_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresve+saṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsatyā.
anya-e0807n0:126_5: Pa+u+du-niādīhi paresaṁ ghādīnaṁ dvibhāve tatiyapaṭhamā honti.
anya-e0807n0:127_0: Rassasarehi paresaṁ vaggadutiyānaṁ dvibhāvo ce, paṭhamā.
anya-e0807n0:130_0: Eonaṁ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā.
anya-e0807n0:130_12: ‘‘Na sandhisamāsā vaddhassā’’ti vuttattā gāthāmajjhe sandhi na hotīti ‘‘tividhassā’’ti vuttatimhi parepi vaṇṇo paro nāma na iti.
anya-e0807n0:133_1: ‘‘Vaggalasehi te’’ti pubbarūpaṁ. Accantaṁ, tacchaṁ, majjaṁ, bujjhati, dhaññaṁ, sebbo,
anya-e0807n0:134_8: asa yate itī+dha ‘‘ye’’ti vattate vakkhamānesu dvīsu.
anya-e0807n0:136_0: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti. Sakkate, ruccate, paccate, aṭṭate, luppate, kuppate, sallate, phallate, dissate, assate.
anya-e0807n0:139_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti yakāre. Muyhati, guyhati.
anya-e0807n0:140_0: Bahu ābādho itī+dha ussavakāre ‘‘hassa vipallāso’’ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:142_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho. Vātveva, bahvābādho.
anya-e0807n0:144_2: evaṁ sukaṭaṁ, patthaṭo, pataṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo.
anya-e0807n0:144_4: Paṇidhānaṁ, paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṁ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, duṇṇayo, niṇṇayo, oṇato.
anya-e0807n0:145_6: tata sabhāvato itī+dha ‘‘ve’’ti vattate yāva ‘‘mayadā sare’’ti.
anya-e0807n0:147_15: vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassā+nurodhena lakkhaṇe pavattitā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā.
anya-e0807n0:147_16: Vāsaddo hi atthadvaye vattate katthaci vikappe,
anya-e0807n0:147_20: Ettha pana kvacisaddassā+nuvattanā tenevā+santavidhi siddhoti vāsaddeni+taradvayaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:148_5: tassa adāsiṁ ahaṁ itī+dha ‘‘niggahītā’’dhikāro ā ‘‘mayadā sare’’ti.
anya-e0807n0:151_5: kiṁ idāni, tvaṁ asi, idaṁ api,
anya-e0807n0:153_0: Niggahītamhā parasarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Katanti,
anya-e0807n0:153_5: sadisaṁva. Vāti kiṁ, kataṁiti, kimiti, dātumapi,
anya-e0807n0:154_0: Pupphaṁ assā uppajjati, evaṁ assa te āsavā itī+dha parassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:156_0: Abyavahitānaṁ dvinnaṁ byañjanānaṁ ekatra ṭhiti saṁyogo,
anya-e0807n0:156_2: tassa vā kvaci lopo hotītiādibyañjanassa lopo.
anya-e0807n0:159_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hotīti nimittānussarānaṁ paccāsatyā tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0807n0:159_1: Paccāsatti nāma ṭhānato āsannatā guṇato vā,
anya-e0807n0:159_3: Niggahītassa anusarīyatīti pacchā katvā sarīyatīti anussarotipi vuccati.
anya-e0807n0:160_0: Ānantarikaṁ ya+māhu, yaṁ yadeva, paccattaṁ eva, taṁ hiitī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:162_6: ‘‘Abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate’’ti ñāyā evasaddasahacariyā ‘‘ya’’ iti sabbādiyasaddasseva gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:168_0: Niggahītassa ma ya dā honti vā sare kvaci.
anya-e0807n0:170_2: taṁ nipātanā’’ti ñāyā lakkhaṇantarena avihitā desa+lopā+gama+vipallāsā,
anya-e0807n0:170_16: sayanassa sānādese ca kate chavassa sayanaṁ=susānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:170_18: khassa khalaādese ca ‘‘saramhā dve’’ti dvittādimhi ca kate uddhaṁ khaṁ assa udukkhalaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:171_1: ravatissa rādese ca kate mahiyaṁ ravatīti mayūro.
